if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 74) {//Magic shortbow startAnimation(256); specialDamage = 10 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 74; }[/quote]

item.title: 2 quick questions
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

All you’ve done is declared a variable and a method. You need to use the method somewhere for it to have any effect.
Handle your NPC’s drop in the monsterDropItem method in the NPCHandler class.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 quick questions
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

Ok first one is how can i change the way my npc faces? it always faces south how could i change so it faced E.G west?

and the other is.

I coded this in my NPCHANDLER.Java and it says no errors but the npc doesn’t drop,

here is my code:

[code]public static int treespirit[] = {
995, 6585};

public static int randomtreespirit() {
    return treespirit[(int) (Math.random() * treespirit.length)];
}[/code]

Read full topic
